subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Volleyball
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: A view of the day in sports, including heroes’ welcomes for Olympians in Russia, Germany and Uganda, and a ceremony for the arrival of the Olympic flag in Rio de Janeiro, host of the 2016 Summer Games.
snippet: A view of the day in sports, including heroes’ welcomes for Olympians in Russia, Germany and Uganda, and a ceremony for the arrival of the Olympic flag in Rio de Janeiro, host of the 2016 Summer Games.
